I've also been testing the mod in 1.6.1 and from what I can tell, it works great. The issue that's causing me to consider uninstalling it though is that it seems completely incompatible with both Strategia and Research Bodies because it causes anything those mods do that's associated with a binary system to fail. Basically they are looking for the next body to be something specific and run across the binary system instead and fail un-gracefully. This causes Strategia for example not to load any of the Planet programs from Duna onward that aren't gas giants and Research Bodies causes Duna's orbit to disappear and won't allow you to tab-select beyond Duna while SB is installed.

[@Sigma88](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/113260-sigma88/) I know you don't have much time, but I'm curious if you think there is a way around this issue to make everyone play nicely while keeping SB installed.

it is definitely possible to solve the issue, but it would require the mods you mentioned to ignore the barycenter bodies

I don't think it would be possible for me to solve the issue only on SB side, feel free to open an issue on my github and ping the devs of the mods you mentioned
